name: Gotta get out!
description:
This is a simple game made with Godot.

A month ago windows update broke my PC and a lot of projects where send to the Void. So, instead of trying to replicate those projects I began a new one, a super simple game, this game.

Furthermore, usually I tend to have a looooooooot of unfinished projects so I thought that maybe, to get the flow going, the secret is to make something smaller and finish this something smaller. So, as a consequence of my thoughts, the humanity has a new silly game. 😉

I enjoyed making it and I hope you'll enjoy it playing it or, at least, you'll have a good time. 

Hope everything goes well and see next time.

See README file for the credits.

CONTROLS:

   Direction: WASD, Arrow Keys, Controller D-Pad (tested with XBOX controller)
    Accept: Space, Controller South Button (A in XBOX, B in Switch Controller, etc)
    Pause: Escape, Controller Start
